resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103599</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103599</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207038</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">African American Perspectives: Pamphlets from the Daniel A. P. Murray Collection, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrikanische Amerikanische Perspektiven: 
Flugschriften vom Daniel A. P. Murray Collection, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perspectives Américaines Africaines : 
Brochures de Daniel A. P. Murray Collection, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perspectives Americanos Africanos: Panfletos 
do Daniel A. P. Murray Coleção, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prospettive Americane Africane: Opuscoli dal 
Daniel A. P. Murray Collection, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρικανικές αμερικανικές προοπτικές: Τεύχη από 
τη συλλογή του Ντάνιελ A. Σελ. Murray, 1818-1907</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Perspectivas Americanas Africanas: Folletos 
del Daniel A. P. Murray Collection, 1818-1907</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents a review of African-American history and culture as seen through the practice of pamphleteering. The site includes sermons on racial pride and essays on segregation, voting rights, and violence against African-Americans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Zusammenfassung der 
Afrikanisch-Amerikanischen Geschichte und der Kultur dar, wie durch 
die Praxis von Pamphleteering gesehen. Die Site schließt 
Predigten auf rassischem Stolz und Versuche auf Abtrennung, wählenden
Rechten und Gewalttätigkeit gegen Afrikanisch-Amerikaner ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente un examen de l'histoire afro-américaine et 
de la culture comme vu par la pratique de pamphleteering. Le 
site inclut des sermons sur la fierté raciale et des essais sur la 
ségrégation, le droit de vote, et la violence contre des 
Afro-Américains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta uma revisão do history e da cultura 
Africano-Americanos como visto com a prática de pamphleteering. 
O local inclui sermons no orgulho racial e essays no 
segregation, em direitas votando, e em violência de encontro aos 
Africano-Americanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta una revisione di storia e di coltura 
Africano-Americane come visto con la pratica di pamphleteering. 
Il luogo include i sermons su orgoglio razziale ed i saggi sulla
segregazione, sui diritti di voto e sulla violenza contro gli 
Africano-Americani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει μια αναθεώρηση της 
αφρικανικός-αμερικανικών ιστορίας και του πολιτισμού όπως 
βλέπει μέσω της πρακτικής. Η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει 
τα κηρύγματα στη φυλετική υπερηφάνεια και τα δοκίμια στο 
διαχωρισμό, τα δικαιώματα ψήφου, και τη βία ενάντια σε 
αφρικανικός-Αμερικανούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta una revisión de la historia y de la 
cultura Africano-Americanas según lo visto con la práctica de 
pamphleteering. El sitio incluye sermones en orgullo racial y 
ensayos en la segregación, derechos al voto, y violencia contra 
Africano-Americanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207038</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103599</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/african-american-perspectives-pamphlets-from-the-daniel-a-p-murray-collection-1818-1907</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
